apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when item data has been loaded in response to a AmazonPurchase.amazonPurchase.loadItemData() call.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatched when item data has been loaded in response to a AmazonPurchase.amazonPurchase.loadItemData() call.
The itemDatas property of the event will be populated with a Vector of AmazonItemData objects.
If any of the given skus are unavailable, they will be found in the unavailableSkus property.

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when the status of purchased Items has been updated for the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatched when the status of purchased Items has been updated for the user.
This event may be dispatched any time after the SDK is initialized.
If any SKUs have been revoked since the last time the extension was initialized, they will be contained in the revokedSkus property.
If there are any receipts available for currently updated purchases, they will be contained in the receipts property.

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when the status of purchased Items for the user has failed to update

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the status of purchased Items for the user has failed to update

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt was made for an item that's already owned by the user

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt was made for an item that's already owned by the user

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt has failed

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt has failed

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt was made for an item with an invalid sku

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt was made for an item with an invalid sku

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt has succeeded

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a purchase attempt has succeeded

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched After the Amazon Purchase SDK has been initialized by calling AmazonPurchase.create().

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatched After the Amazon Purchase SDK has been initialized by calling AmazonPurchase.create().
The event property 'isSandboxMode' will be TRUE if the app is currently in sandbox/testing mode, or FALSE if the app is currently in production mode (live on the Amazon App Store.)

apiValue.shortdesc: True if currently in sandbox mode, false if production; associated with an SDK_AVAILABLE response.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: True if currently in sandbox mode, false if production; associated with an SDK_AVAILABLE response.

apiValue.shortdesc: Vector Array of AmazonItemData objects, associated with an ITEM_DATA_LOADED response.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Vector Array of AmazonItemData objects, associated with an ITEM_DATA_LOADED response.

apiValue.shortdesc: The Product Sku Associated with this event

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Product Sku Associated with this event

apiValue.shortdesc: Vector Array of Receipts associated with an PURCHASES_UPDATED event

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Vector Array of Receipts associated with an PURCHASES_UPDATED event

apiValue.shortdesc: Vector Array of SKU strings that have been revoked; associated with an PURCHASES_UPDATED event.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Vector Array of SKU strings that have been revoked; associated with an PURCHASES_UPDATED event.

apiValue.shortdesc: Vector Array of SKU strings that were requested buy not available anymore; associated with an ITEM_DATA_UNAVAILABLE_SKUS event.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Vector Array of SKU strings that were requested buy not available anymore; associated with an ITEM_DATA_UNAVAILABLE_SKUS event.
